name: Abbadon's Blessing
description:
You've been killed.
You've been revived.
You want revenge.

A bizzarre hardcore top-down shooter, with a powerful moral message that is "murder bad deal with devil bad too".

It was made for the #LOWREZJAM2018 in 14 days in Godot Engine. Have fun I guess, or die trying (in game I mean)

Controls:
LMB - Shoot
RMB - Teleport
WASD - Move
R / Space - Restart
